mainEntity.name: When does GTA VI come out?

acceptedAnswer.text: Grand Theft Auto VI (GTA VI) is scheduled to release on November 19, 2026.

mainEntity.name: How much time until GTA 6 release?

acceptedAnswer.text: Use our countdown timer to see exactly how many days, hours, minutes, and seconds remain until GTA VI launches.

mainEntity.name: Can I embed the GTA countdown on my stream?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes! We provide free embeddable widgets compatible with OBS Studio, Streamlabs, and any website. Visit our Embed section to get started.

mainEntity.name: Is this an official Rockstar Games website?

acceptedAnswer.text: No, this is a fan-made countdown website. It is not affiliated with Rockstar Games. GTA VI is a trademark of Rockstar Games.

mainEntity.name: Is the countdown timer free to use?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, our GTA VI countdown timer and widget are completely free to use for everyone.
